chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product is iPhone 13 Pro, which has the above problem:
Incorrect delivery address, correct: Jahnstrasse 5 B, 17033 Neubrandenburg
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile 

The customer has entered the wrong delivery address (location). Can you change this?
Correct: Jahnstrasse 5 B, 17033 Neubrandenburg

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: 
The shipping address was wrong. Correct: Dietmar Olstedt 17033 Neubrandenburg Jahnstraße 5b
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have updated our logistics partner with the correct address. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer, thank you.

Regards,
YR

Hello ecomobile,

The customer has requested the invoice for this order. While we are waiting for the invoice, I have sent the proof of payment.

Can you please provide the invoice within the next 48 hours so we can send it to the customer?

As a reminder, if the invoice is not received within 48 hours of this request, we will have to make a goodwill payment of 20% of the order value (including tax but excluding shipping), up to a maximum of €50.

We look forward to hearing from you.

Thank you for your continued partnership and support

Thank you for understanding,
Rabia from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the invoice in this message. Do let me know if the customer still requires any further assistance. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
